thread.title: Ryan Gosling embarrassed at Emma Stone's awards speech
thread.title_full: Ryan Gosling embarrassed at Emma Stone's SAG awards speech | Daily Mail Online

author: Bobbie Whiteman For Dailymail.com
title: Ryan Gosling embarrassed at Emma Stone's awards speech

organizations.name: jessica wright floral embroidered sheet maxi dress

text:
She seemed genuinely surprised to land the Screen Actors Guild Award for actress for La La Land at the Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles on Sunday.
But even more surprising - and completely adorable - was the reaction of Emma Stone's co-star Ryan Gosling when she gushed about him on stage.
'Ryan, you're the best. That's just the truth. No one can argue it,' she said as the laughing 36-year-old covered his face with his hand in embarrassment.
'You're the best!' An embarrassed Ryan Gosling covered his smiling face as his La La Land co-star gushed about him on stage when she picked up SAG's best actress honour on Sunday
Don't look at me! The actor seemed shy. Also at his table were John Legend and Chrissy Teigen
The hunky star was seated at a table next to crooner John Legend and his wife, model Chrissy Teigen, as he watched his onscreen love interest pick up her statuette.
Emma also went on to thank the musical's director Damien Chazelle.
And the star had a shout out for the other actresses in the category, Meryl Streep, Natalie Portman, Amy Adams and Emily Blunt.
Lost for words: The 28-year-old seemed genuinely surprised when she received SAG's best actress honour
Rock romantic florals in a maxi dress like Emma Stone's Alexander McQueen Pre-Fall 2017
Click to shop the current collection
Buy now
Emma Stone won Outstanding Performance by a Female Actor at the SAG Awards last night, and we reckon she deserves another trophy for her red carpet style!
One of our favourite looks of the evening, Emma sported an Alexander McQueen Pre-Fall 2017 dress, featuring an asymmetric strappy lace bodice and floral embroidered frill detail skirt.
We love the romantic aesthetic of the delicate embroidery of this dress combined with the fun flounces; meanwhile the fitted bodice and floaty skirt make for a super flattering fit.
Sadly this dress is not yet available to buy but you can follow the link on the right to shop the current ready-to-wear collection, then recreate the look with one of the picks from our edit of similar styles below.
A dress like this does all the talking so keep accessories to a minimum, styling with barely there heels like Emma

The beautiful 28-year-old and Ryan are old friends.
They also worked together on Crazy Stupid Love and Gangster Squad.
Ryan didn't get the SAG honour for best actor, losing out to Fences' Denzel Washington.
Put your hands together: Ryan applauded Emma when her win was announced
But he did win the Golden Globe for actor earlier this month.
The film is nominated for a historic 14 Oscar nominations, tying the record held by All About Eve (1950) and Titanic (1997).
The Academy Awards will take place in Los Angeles on February 26.
Crazy in love: La La Land is up for a historic 14 Oscars, tying the record held by All About Eve (1950) and Titanic (1997). The Academy Awards will take place in Los Angeles on February 26
